b'Romangeun Eobsda': b'Hwang Soon-bok is a father of four who isn\xe2\x80\x99t gifted with great looks. He likes to make plans on family occasions which, in most cases, end in disaster. His wife, Koh Young-sook, is a nice-looking lady with bit of a temper. And, there are three daughters and a son who got their looks and personalities from both parents.
